languages.text: Священник, отбросив разряженное лазружье, касавшийся пальцами кровоточащих ушей и чертивший ими на переборке алую надпись: "Не слушай его. Он — не ангел!". К кому он обращался? Ко мне?!

traits.locale_text: Священник, отбросив разряженный лазган, касавшийся пальцами кровоточащих ушей и чертивший ими на переборке алую надпись: "Не слушай его. Он — не ангел!". К кому он обращался? Ко мне?!

languages.text: After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?
languages.original_text: Священник, отбросив разряженное лазружье, касавшийся пальцами кровоточащих ушей и чертивший ими на переборке алую надпись: "Не слушай его. Он — не ангел!". К кому он обращался? Ко мне?!

traits.locale_text: After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

languages.text: Tras echar a un lado su rifle láser agotado, un sacerdote se llevó los dedos a los oídos sangrantes y escribió con ellos estas palabras en la mampara: «No le hagas caso. ¡No es ningún ángel!». ¿A quién iba dirigido ese mensaje? ¿A mí?
languages.original_text: After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

traits.locale_text: Tras echar a un lado su rifle láser agotado, un sacerdote se llevó los dedos a los oídos sangrantes y escribió con ellos estas palabras en la mampara: «No le hagas caso. ¡No es ningún ángel!». ¿A quién iba dirigido ese mensaje? ¿A mí?

languages.text: 一位神甫把用光了能量的激光枪丢到一旁，手指放在流着血的耳朵上，之后在舱壁上涂抹下了这些深红色的字。“别听他的话，他不是天使！”他是在和谁说话？是我吗？
languages.original_text: After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

traits.locale_text: 一位祭司把用光了能量的激光枪丢到一旁，手指放在流着血的耳朵上，之后在舱壁上涂抹下了这些深红色的字。“别听他的话，他不是天使！”他是在和谁说话？是我吗？

languages.text: 使い切ったラスガンを脇に放り投げ、司祭は血が流れる自分の耳に指を当ててから、その血に塗れた指で燃え盛るような言葉を隔壁に書きつけた。「ヤツの話を聞くな。ヤツは天使なんかじゃない！」と。誰に言っているのだろうか？私か？
languages.original_text: After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

traits.locale_text: 使い切ったラスガンを脇に放り投げ、司祭は血が流れる自分の耳に指を当ててから、その血に塗れた指で燃え盛るような言葉を隔壁に書きつけた。「ヤツの話を聞くな。ヤツは天使なんかじゃない！」と。誰に言っているのだろうか？私か？

languages.text: Nachdem er seine entladene Laserpistole beiseite geworfen hatte, hielt sich ein Priester die Finger an die blutenden Ohren und schmierte diese purpurnen Worte auf das Schott: "Hört nicht auf ihn. Er ist kein Engel!" Mit wem hat er gesprochen? Mit mir?
languages.original_text: After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

languages.text: Après s'être débarrassé de son fusil laser déchargé, un prêtre a porté ses doigts à ses oreilles ensanglantées, puis a barbouillé ces mots écarlates sur une cloison : « Ne l'écoutez pas. Ce n'est pas un ange ! » De qui parlait-il ? De moi ?
languages.original_text: After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

traits.locale_text: Après s'être débarrassé de son fusil laser déchargé, un prêtre a porté ses doigts à ses oreilles ensanglantées, puis a barbouillé ces mots écarlates sur une cloison : « Ne l'écoutez pas. Ce n'est pas un ange ! » De qui parlait-il ? De moi ?

languages.text: Şarjörü boşalmış silazerini kenara atan bir rahip, parmaklarını kanayan kulaklarına götürüp bölme paneline şu kızıl sözcükleri yazdı: "Onu dinleme. Melek değil o!" Kiminle konuşuyordu? Benimle mi?
languages.original_text: After tossing aside his discharged lasgun, a priest brought his fingers to his bleeding ears and then daubed these crimson words on the bulkhead: "Don't listen to him. He is no angel!" Who was he talking to? Me?

traits.locale_text: Şarjı bitmiş lazer silahını kenara atan bir rahip, parmaklarını kanayan kulaklarına götürüp bölme paneline şu kızıl sözcükleri yazıyor: "Onu dinleme. O melek değil!" Kiminle konuşuyor? Benimle mi?
